description:
VMware did not mention in-the-wild exploitation for CVE-2024-37085 but Microsoft says ransomware gangs are abusing the just-patched flaw.

The post Microsoft Says Ransomware Gangs Exploiting Just-Patched VMware ESXi Flaw appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Microsoft Says Ransomware Gangs Exploiting Just-Patched VMware ESXi Flaw

description:
Threat actors have exploited Proofpoint’s email protection service to deliver millions of spoofed phishing emails.

The post Phishing Campaign Exploited Proofpoint Email Protections for Spoofing appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Phishing Campaign Exploited Proofpoint Email Protections for Spoofing

description:
Researchers discovered and published details of an XSS attack that could potentially impact millions of websites around the world.

The post Millions of Websites Susceptible XSS Attack via OAuth Implementation Flaw appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Millions of Websites Susceptible XSS Attack via OAuth Implementation Flaw

description:
Acronis warns of a critical-severity Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) vulnerability being exploited in attacks.

The post Acronis Product Vulnerability Exploited in the Wild appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Acronis Product Vulnerability Exploited in the Wild

description:
HealthEquity says the personal and health information of 4.3 million individuals was compromised in a data breach.

The post 4.3 Million Impacted by HealthEquity Data Breach appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: 4.3 Million Impacted by HealthEquity Data Breach

description:
178 cybersecurity M&A deals were announced in the first half of 2024, the smallest half year number since SecurityWeek started tracking them. 

The post SecurityWeek Analysis: 178 Cybersecurity M&A Deals Announced in First Half of 2024 appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: SecurityWeek Analysis: 178 Cybersecurity M&A Deals Announced in First Half of 2024

description:
Wiz has detailed SeleniumGreed, a campaign in which threat actors target exposed Selenium Grid instances for cryptomining.

The post Selenium Grid Instances Exploited for Cryptomining appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Selenium Grid Instances Exploited for Cryptomining

description: Explore industry moves and significant changes in the industry for the week of July 29, 2024. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and shifts.
title: Industry Moves for the week of July 29, 2024 - SecurityWeek
